title: Leadership-Changing Env
description: The course focuses on the leadership challenges posed by recent changes in the business environment, and on the skills needed to adapt to those changes.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 3101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3150 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
